episodes.title: An Honest Conversation with Sarah & Nippy of "A Little Bit Culty"
episodes.description: Since we've been chatting about cults lately we wanted to bring back our episode with ex-NXIVM members Sarah and Nippy from A Little Bit Culty. This is an honest conversation about manipulation, the abuse of power and red flags. We could have done a whole other episode on multi-level marketing but for now we will leave you with two A Little Bit Culty episodes that discuss their view on MLM's. Enjoy! https://www.alittlebitculty.com/season-2/episode-one-yr3hz-ychpc https://www.alittlebitculty.com/season1/ep7 Want our podcasts sent straight to your phone? episodes.title: Cults & Consequences
episodes.description: On today’s podcast we did a deep dive into Dancing for the Devil, the Netflix show about an alleged cult linked to the founder of 7M Films, a talent management company for TikTok dancers. At what point do your children stop listening to you as a parent? It just goes to show how powerful the love for a partner can be compared to that of a parent or family member. As moms, it is heartbreaking to watch a child make decisions that are completely out of your control—decisions that are not benefiting their health or safety.
